# Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal - Wire Mesh Carts 2024

The Canada Post Corporation is seeking a supplier to manufacture and deliver various carts and mail handling equipment. The solicitation is currently closed.

### Proposal Information

The Canada Post Corporation has issued a Request for Proposal for the manufacturing and delivery of wire mesh carts, which is a competitive bid solicitation. The scope of the requirement can be found in the ARIBA Sourcing Event (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19375043).

The solicitation documents and bidding instructions are available on the MERX website ([https://www.merx.com](https://www.merx.com)). Please note that fees may apply for access to the website; refer to the MERX website pricing section for more information.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to three trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

Respondents must confirm their eligibility to participate in the trade agreement(s) as per the CANOC classification.

### Disclaimer

The Canada Post Corporation reserves the right to modify or cancel the solicitation at any time, and all interested suppliers are required to register with the Canadian Tender Agency for access to complete solicitation documents.

By releasing this solicitation, the Canada Post Corporation does not intend to create any contractual commitment to respondents. This notice is for general information purposes only.
